ing: 1 cup candy-coated dark chocolate pieces (such as M&M's Dark Chocolate Â®)
2 1/2 cups salted deluxe mixed nuts (without peanuts)
des: "My friends and family like the combination of sweet and salty. Makes a nice gift. Proportions are a guide; change to suit your own preferences."
ins: Combine the cranberries, cherries, blueberries, pineapple, chocolate, and mixed nuts until evenly blended. Store in an airtight container.
